greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Completely multiplicative function with a(prime(k)) = prime(k)*prime(k-1), a(2) = 2.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a /@ Range[n]]; a200746[57] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 19 2014 *)
program: (Scheme, with memoization-macro definec) (definec (A200746 n) (if (<= n 2) n (* n (A064989 n)))) ;; _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 18 2014
results.author: _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Nov 25 2011
